trans-unit.source: Represents a set of query parameters that can be passed to a personalization provider using the various get and find methods.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de parâmetros de consulta que pode ser passado para um provedor de personalização usando vários get e localizar métodos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada como um valor de parâmetro para obter vários e localizar os métodos de um provedor de personalização, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default indexer allows generic access to the query parameters maintained by this object.
trans-unit.target: O indexador padrão permite o acesso genérico para os parâmetros de consulta mantida pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: The three properties that are explicitly exposed by this class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, are stored using query key values that are the same as the property names of this class.
trans-unit.target: As três propriedades que são explicitamente expostas por essa classe, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>são armazenados usando valores de chave de consulta que são os mesmos que os nomes de propriedade desta classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A instance of this class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância dessa classe é usada como um valor de parâmetro para obter vários e localizar os métodos de um provedor de personalização, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the query parameter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do parâmetro de consulta.

trans-unit.source: This property is the default indexer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é o indexador padrão para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>

trans-unit.source: It returns the value of the query parameter indicated by `queryKey`.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor do parâmetro de consulta indicado pelo `queryKey`.

trans-unit.source: You can use `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`, `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]` and `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]` to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`, `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]` e `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]` para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: When these three properties are set in the indexer, they are validated against the proper type.
trans-unit.target: Quando essas três propriedades são definidas no indexador, eles são validados em relação ao tipo adequado.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if `queryKey` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna `null` se `queryKey` não existe.

trans-unit.source: A case-insensitive query string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de consulta diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The value should be one of the following: "PathToMatch", "UserInactiveSinceDate", or "UsernameToMatch".
trans-unit.target: O valor deve ser um dos seguintes: "PathToMatch", "UserInactiveSinceDate" ou "UsernameToMatch".

trans-unit.source: The value of the query parameter indicated by the queryKey parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor do parâmetro de consulta indicada pelo queryKey parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: queryKey is .
trans-unit.target: queryKeyis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho a ser usado para uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: This property contains a path to match when executing queries.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um caminho para corresponder ao executar consultas.

trans-unit.source: If PathToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Se PathToMatch contiver caracteres curinga, eles são passados para o repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on path.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser definida como `null`, indicando que uma consulta não deve filtrar com base no caminho.

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for não`null`, seu valor é cortado.

trans-unit.source: The path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: O caminho a ser usado para uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last active date used in a query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a última data active usada em uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property to filter against.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade indica o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>propriedade para filtrar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exact comparison is to include records where the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> is less than or equal to the value of the UserInactiveSinceDate property.
trans-unit.target: A comparação exata é incluir registros onde o valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>é menor ou igual ao valor da propriedade UserInactiveSinceDate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, indicating that a query should not filter based on the last activity date.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser definida como <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, indicando que uma consulta não deve filtrar com base na última data de atividade.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The last active date to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: A última data ativa a ser usado em uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name in a query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de usuário em uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the user name to filter against when executing a query.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o nome de usuário para filtrar em relação ao executar uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: If UsernameToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Se UsernameToMatch contiver caracteres curinga, eles são passados para o repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on the user name.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser definida como `null`, indicando que uma consulta não deve filtrar com base no nome de usuário.

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for não`null`, seu valor é cortado.

trans-unit.source: The user name to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário a ser usado em uma consulta.
